thread.title: 'Elated' Gabrielle Union feels 'blessed' getting married to friend-like-hubby
thread.title_full: 'Elated' Gabrielle Union feels 'blessed' getting married to friend-like-hubby - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 'Elated' Gabrielle Union feels 'blessed' getting married to friend-like-hubby
text:
*Washington D.C., Oct.15 (ANI): Gabrielle Union has recently opened up about her first year of marriage with husband Dwayne Wade.*
Washington D.C., Oct.15 (ANI): Gabrielle Union has recently opened up about her first year of marriage with husband Dwayne Wade. In a recent interview, the 42-year-old actress, who recently celebrated her first wedding anniversary, revealed that they were always best friends, adding that love was always there between them, but they "could not figure out how to be a partner at the same time", E! Online reports. The 'Being Mary Jane' actress added, "It was just like, you're my best friend in the world and I love you so intensely, let's figure it out." Talking about frequently asked baby questions, the 'Bring It On' actress said many people believe that after the nuptials is done, it is time to shift the focus from career to baby-making. However, Union believes that she can manage both. (ANI) Â»
